# notacompany.com

**Website:** https://notacompany.com
**Contact:** hey@notacompany.com

## About

We build consumer infrastructure that makes better living effortless. From health and payments to investing, work, and play â€” we design and launch the rails that power daily life.

Our team consists of engineers who understand the complexities of building consumer-facing products that millions of people rely on every day. We focus on creating the foundational infrastructure that enables seamless, effortless experiences across all aspects of modern life.

## Our Work

### Consumer Infrastructure Development

We design, build, and launch infrastructure across multiple consumer verticals:

**Health Infrastructure:**
- Wellness and fitness accountability systems
- Health data management and analytics
- Preventative care and behavioral intervention tools

**Financial Infrastructure:**
- Payment processing and settlement rails
- Investment platforms and portfolio management
- Digital banking and financial services

**Work Infrastructure:**
- Professional networking and talent platforms
- Educational ecosystems and skill development
- Career advancement and opportunity matching

**Lifestyle Infrastructure:**
- Entertainment and gaming platforms
- Transportation and mobility solutions
- E-commerce and retail experiences

**What makes our approach different:**
- Engineering-first mindset with deep consumer empathy
- Focus on effortless user experiences over feature complexity
- Infrastructure-level thinking for scalable, lasting solutions
- Real-world validation through our own consumer product builds

## Our Team

Our team is made up of 100% engineers who actively build and ship consumer products. This hands-on approach ensures we understand the real-world challenges of creating infrastructure that millions of people depend on daily.

## Current Projects

**What We're Building:** We maintain active consumer infrastructure projects to validate our approach and stay current with the evolving needs of modern consumers.

**Active Infrastructure Project:**
- **Steps.org** - Health infrastructure for exercise accountability and GAD mitigation (Contact: hey@steps.org)

**Past Infrastructure Projects:**
- **Polkastarter** - Financial infrastructure for decentralized fundraising (ACQUIRED)
- **Coinvision** - Financial infrastructure for blockchain due-diligence (ACQUIRED)  
- **Codeplace** - Work infrastructure for Ruby education ecosystem (ACQUIRED)

**Learning Experiences:**
- **Mahalo** - P2P Non-Profit Fundraising Infrastructure (DECEASED)
- **Songvice** - Music Producer Advisory Infrastructure (DECEASED)

## Partnership History

We have built consumer infrastructure solutions for leading companies across various sectors:

- **Acreditar** - Portugal's largest non-profit organization
- **xMoney** - Digital payment and financial services infrastructure
- **Talent Protocol** - Decentralized data infrastructure platform
- **Bet Protocol** - Decentralized betting ecosystem infrastructure
- **Lime** - Mobility and transportation infrastructure
- **Parfois** - Fashion and retail infrastructure
- **Coflyt** - Private aviation infrastructure
- **Fisacar** - Automotive services infrastructure

## Positioning

**Mission:** Building consumer infrastructure that makes better living effortless
**Focus Areas:** Health, payments, investing, work, and lifestyle infrastructure
**Unique Value:** Engineering-first approach with deep consumer empathy and infrastructure thinking
**Validation:** Real-world consumer products with millions of users and successful exits
**Team:** 100% engineers who build the infrastructure they design
**Approach:** Infrastructure-level solutions for scalable, lasting consumer experiences

## Key Differentiators

- 100% engineering team with hands-on consumer infrastructure experience
- Active infrastructure builders who validate their own approaches
- Deep understanding of consumer behavior and infrastructure needs
- Proven track record with successful exits and scale
- Focus on effortless user experiences over feature complexity
- Infrastructure-level thinking for maximum impact and sustainability
- Real-world validation through consumer product development
